QuestData.Title: In the Outhouse
QuestData.Description: Hello? Hello! HELP!$B$BI'm almost out of air! You have to get me out of here!$B$B<The voice inside gags.>$B$BOne of those Southsea treasure hunters has got to have a crowbar!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Pirate's Crowbar and use it to pry open the Submerged Outhouse door.
QuestData.CompletionText: Oh, for the love of the Light, do you have that crowbar yet? Drowning here!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank goodness! Now, just a little shove....

Objectives.Objective: Use the crowbar on the outhouse
